reviews.text:
We had the absolute best experience working with Bobcat Custom Construction on our backyard project here in Allen. Jimmy managed the entire scope of the project flawlessly and was incredibly accessible, answering every question we had along the way. He even handled all the HOA and City of Allen requirements, setting clear expectations and getting approvals quickly and smoothly — a huge relief for us!

Jimmy and his team built our stunning pergola, extended our patio, and coordinated beautifully

Jimmy and his crews were fantastic to work with. His drawings were perfect which made permit and HOA approval fast and easy. His crews were very  friendly and worked hard the entire time they were on site. We are very excited, happy and proud of our simple patio cover and stamped concrete.  It is beautiful and we love spending time hanging out under it. We highly recommend Jimmy and his team to make your back yard look as amazing as you want.

Jimmy and is crew did an awesome job, we are extremely pleased with how our backyard turned out.  I had several companies bid the same project and Jimmy's bid was the most reasonable and in the end he provided excellent quality and craftmanship.  My wife and I agree, that the stone mason, and his crew were artisans.  We will recommend Bobcat Customs to anyone looking to renovate their backyard.

We loved working with Jimmy at Bobcat. He was easy to get a hold of and very responsive. He came out and listened to our ideas and got us set up with exactly what we wanted. They were quick and did the highest quality work. The results exceeded our expectations, and we absolutely love the patio. It's another room for our home! We would definitely recommend Bobcat Custom Outdoors.

We recently had Bobcat do a roughly 600 sqft concrete expansion to our patio, an 18’x24’ gabled roof extension and 16’x16’ pergola as well as an Austin cream chopped stone outdoor kitchen and bar and all the electric work to go along with it. We had 4 different contractors come out and bid; Jimmy with Bobcat hands down was the most thorough and willing to help us realize our dream patio. He was both knowledgeable and creative. His crews are amazing and the quality and craftsmanship can’t be beat

I want to say Jimmy with Bobcat Customs was such a pleasure to work with on our Deck cover and new fencing. There were no hassles, great crew of guys on his team, great workmanship, very professional. Everything went just as Jimmy said it would, and I want to tell you it went fast, lol.  The deck cover and new fence we put off way too long. Jimmy made our vision come to light perfectly... You'll find us hanging out in the backyard a lot now! Bobcat Customs is THE BEST!!! we're spreading the word

We contacted Bobcat Custom Outdoors to quote on a new patio cover and to extend and install a concrete patio and a courtyard. The quote was great. Bobcat submitted all the paperwork to the City of McKinney and supplied the paperwork for us to submit to the HOA. The quality and attention to detail in their work was excellent. All the subcontractors were polite and diligent to get a great job done. It took a little longer due to Covid but we couldn't be happier with the result. I would absolutely

Bobcat Custom Outdoors did an amazing job with our patio. Jimmy, the owner, was responsive and professional. He was communicative with every step of the way and addressed all the concerns I had. The pricing was reasonable as well. I would definitely recommend them to my family and friends.

Loved working with Jimmy. We had a large patio extension and partial outdoor kitchen. He was extremely knowledgeable, coached us on pros and cons of decision making, had great suggestions and he and his team provided excellent craftsmanship. We would use Bobcat Construction again!

We used Bobcat for a driveway removal, replacement, wooden swing gate, and stone landscape edging.  I met Jimmy at my house and walked through what I wanted done on the project. He provided a clear and detailed estimate and we went to contract.  He let me know the schedule and barring a lot of rain that caused some delays, he had his guys working to get it done.  The project has been complete for 8 months and I have a nice new driveway and a beautiful gate that I have received a lot of complimen

We had Bobcat Custom Construction do a custom stained concrete overlay for our pool decking.  The process was flawless from beginning to end.  Jimmy worked closely with us on our vision and design, provided clear pricing and timelines.  The team was highly skilled, thorough and did a fantastic job.

The final product exceeded our expectations, was done on time, on budget with professional quality.

I am very pleased with the quality of my patio cover by Bobcat Custom Outdoors. My project was not big in size but is grand in stature. Everyone from Bobcat who worked on my project was professional and left my yard clean. Jimmy gave me a $500 "magazine discount" that I knew nothing about. I will surely be using Bobcat Custom Outdoors on any future projects my wife dreams up.

Jimmy and his team at Bobcat did an outstanding job on remodeling of our kitchen and laying wood floors throughout our downstairs. His attention to detail and thoughtfulness throughout the process was second to none. Would absolutely recommend him for any job you need done!

This was our second time using Bobcat Custom - results were fantastic. Bobcat completed full exterior paint, wood replacement and updated our patio with tongue and groove wood and new fans. Will definitely use them again!

We just got Bobcat Custom Outdoors to build us a new fence about a month ago. It has been first rate from the beginning through the completion. From the professionalism of the first meeting to the care and meticulous build and clean-up.... we could not be happier.  The fence has actually transitioned our backyard and curb-appeal. I would highly recommend Bobcat Custom Outdoors to anyone looking for a high-quality and very competitive fence.

We met Jimmy through a neighbor and within a week had an onsite meeting and a quote in hand for our new board on board cedar fence.  This was the most productive and professional team we've worked with in 25 years.  They showed up early, left late and we're all about productivity not activity.  For a complex job - including resetting 2 iron gates and welding, we only had 6 or 7 small punch list items - addressed and resolved within 3 working days of submission.  I'd use these guys again in a hea

Bobcat did our full kitchen renovation in early 2025. They handled demo, haul away, and then the entire rebuild according to our design specifications. For us, this included removing one partial wall, custom cabinet install, paint, electrical, counters, floors, plumbing, appliance install, and tile backsplash. It was a big undertaking over a few months, but someone was here at work constantly and communication was constant about plans. We highly recommend Bobcat Custom Construction to our neighb

We recently had the exterior of our home completely redone. We had brick work done, painting, new roof, and an amazing patio addition built. Jimmy and his team at Bobcat was wonderful to work with. They were on time, reliable, kept a clean job site, pleasant to work with, highly knowledge and the quality of work blew us away. We will definitely use Bobcat for any further home renovations we take on and is highly recommend them to anyone who is looking for a contractor.
We worked with jimmy to craft a custom gate solution for our backyard. He offered options and his crew was friendly and finished on time. I highly reccomend bobcat.

Bobcat Custom Outdoors did an amazing job on my outdoor patio and kitchen! My dreams for a luxury outdoor living space could not have gone better with Jimmy and his team! They were very responsive, professional and made sure I was happy throughout the entire process. The workmanship of everything is top notch and I would recommend Bobcat to anyone! I couldn’t be happier!

Bobcat team led by Jimmy has recently built an outdoor patio for us. We are very pleased with their workmanship, professionalism and courteous service. Jimmy was thorough and very easy to work with. He kept us updated at each step and was always available for questions & suggestions.. We appreciate their professionalism and flexibility in accommodating all our requests. Their pricing is fair and honest and no cutting corners at any stage. Highly recommend Bobcat custom outdoors.

Thanks to Jimmy

We did a fair amount of research on covered patios, asked friends and neighbors, and got several quotes before we decided to go with Bobcat Custom Outdoors.  Jimmy is very knowledgeable, was helpful with our design questions, was detail-oriented, and very responsive to our texts/calls.  The crew that worked on our patio was great.  They showed up as scheduled, always cleaned up at the end of the day, and most importantly, they were super friendly and polite.  We are extremely happy with the fini

Bobcat helped us design and build quite a large, custom patio for our backyard that fit our very specific needs and preferences. Jimmy was outstanding throughout the whole process.  He was patient and responsive with any questions. He gave recommendations where we were unsure of what choices to make and gave us plenty of options. His workers were all very polite, friendly and conscientious about doing a great job. He was also very reassuring and accommodating with any issues or changes that we w

From the start Jimmy was great! He returned my call quickly and we set up a time to meet for an estimate. He was the third contractor/builder that I recieved a quote from and by far his price was the best.  His crew of men were very professional and they cleaned up after themselves.  They finished my project quickly and I'm very satisfied with my outdoor space.  I would recommend Jimmy and his crew to anyone.  Keep up the good work Bobcat Custom Outdoors.

I had Bobcat renovate my interior fireplace changing it from wood to stone.  The new fireplace looks great, exceeding my expectations.  The work crew did a great job and was very respectful of my home.  Jimmy has put together a great team.  I highly recommend them.  They also put up a new fence after spring storms blew down fence. Great looking fence at good price.

My experience with Bobcat Custom Outdoors was amazing. The communication between Jimmy and the team was exceptional from the beginning to the completion of the project. There was not a time that my wife and I were not aware of anything that they were working on and they hit their timeline perfectly. In this line of business communication is key and they are exceptional.
I would recommend them to anybody.
As well to follow up their work was perfect as you can tell that each employee is a perfecti

We decided to build a beautiful outdoor patio and chose Bobcat Custom Outdoors to design and bring it to life. We met with Jimmy and came up with a plan, and stuck to the plan except for maybe a couple of days due to weather. The plans came to life in a beautiful way with all the craftmanship we love! Jimmy was very responsive to any questions or concerns we had and he was very upfront when managing our expectations throughout the process. Great crews! We would highly recommend Bobcat Custom Out
Very happy with our outdoor fireplace!  It is absolutely beautiful and was done very professionally and smoothly and turned out better than we had hoped for! Thank you so much!

We hired Bobcat to enlarge our back patio and build a custom outdoor space.  When we received Jimmy's detailed estimate along with a CAD drawing of the project....we knew we had found our guy!  This set the tone for the enitre project.  Jimmy and his crews were responsive, thorough, professional and the project moved at a consistent pace with each trade following the work flow until project completion.  Both the overall experience and quality of work exceeded our very high expectations.  We high

The experience was so smooth and without any hiccups. Jimmy the owner really listen to my wants and delivered beyond my expectations. We are very pleased with our 29x14 arbor with surround sounds, fans, and lights. If you want a job done right Bobcat Custom Outdoors would be my first pick. I am having more done next summer and I want it done right the first time, so I will be calling Bobcat back to my home.

Absolutely give Bobcat Custom Outdoors 5 stars.  We had our patio extended and stained and Jimmy, the owner, is very responsive and detailed and his crew did an amazing job.  Look no further for your backyard renovation needs.  You won’t be disappointed!

We had our large concrete patio resurfaced. Great experience with Bobcat from the initial consult to the final quality check after the job was done. Everything was explained to us thoroughly with all of our questions. It was such an easy process. The whole family loves how it turned out.  Can’t wait for our next outdoor project with Bobcat Custom Outdoors!

Jimmy was prepared for our first meeting, punctual, and practical on what could be done to expand our outdoor patio while working to preserve the architectural feel of our house.  He provided very quick sketches and pricing and the construction was high quality and without interruption.  He followed up regularly to make sure the end product matched our expectations, and was always available during and after completion.  Jimmy is a professional who I fully trust to stand behind his craftsmanship.

Bobcat Custom Outdoors extended our patio with stamp & stain and also installed an arbor with supporting electrical for TV, fans etc.. We are very satisfied with the quality of the work and timeliness of delivery.  The price for the work was competitive, I received 4 bids, and the price plus references made Bobcat the right choice for us.  To which I was very happy that the estimate was firm and there was never an increase in cost to the original requirements .

I should also call out that I mad

Jimmy and the team did an excellent job. He was very attentive to our needs and responsive during the construction process. Little issues always come up during a construction project and Jimmy was great at addressing those issues quickly. We are excited to enjoy our new outdoor patio cover.

Bobcat Construction installed a covered patio and built in grille complex for us in the summer of 2022. Their work was excellent. They had several crews working on various aspects of the project and all were excellent and very professional in their work. We were very pleased in their work and highly recommend them.

After receiving other design and price quotes it was clear Bobcat was the top. Our experience kept getting better with each stage of our construction. We are ecstatic about how our structure has turned out and did recommend Bobcat Custom Outdoors to all our neighbors in Parker Lake Estates.

We had a fence with gate installed recently. The owner of Bobcat (Jimmy) was on time for review and bid process. He explained options/timing of process (scheduling, permits, install/staining) & pricing was comparable to other bids. We went with Bobcat because recommendation of co-worker and positive online reviews.

His crew was efficient (even during hot stretch of weather this summer), polite and respectful of our property. Cedar fence looks great and Bobcat uses a beautiful coloring for stain

We recently had Bobcat Custom Outdoors install our new fence and driveway gate. We can't tell you how happy we are. This is a family-owned business that takes great pride in what they do. From design to install, our backyard space has been transformed! The  process was so easy, Jimmy and team made sure every detail was taken care of.
They did a great job and I got exactly what I was looking for. Quality workmanship and great communication. Don't bother using anyone else, these guys are the best!

I have selected Bobcat over other three builders despite mixed higher and lower estimation for building a quite large 24x26 sqrt ft patio cover.  I felt easier to work with Jimmy.  He worked hard to come up with different estimations for different options.  Screw teams: frame, stones, and roof, did great job and knew what they were doing.  Just the stain screws left a messy job as I have had to clean-up the next days.  Over all, great job and the patio looks very nice and solid.

Bobcat Custom Outdoors is the BEST in the industry! Their work is top-notch, their customer service is outstanding and the prices are better than any other company around. We have had neighbors stop by our house and ask us for Bobcat's contact information, because of the quality work they put into building our fence and gate. We will absolutely use Bobcat Custom Outdoors for many other projects in the future!!

Thank you Bobcat Custom Outdoors! We love our new back patio. Jimmy and his crew were great. Th patio exceeded our expectations. The clean up was great as well. I highly recommend Jimmy Jaubert and his professional crew!

I love our horizontal board on board fence, electric gate and arbor. We are so pleased with the quality and craftsmanship and have recieved several compliments. Jimmy was available and easy to work with, and our project was completed in a timely manner. We highly recommend Bobcat Custom Outdoors.

Very please with my new fence.  Jimmy is a pro and a subject matter expert when it comes to fences, outdoor living spaces, and meeting his customers needs.  Even if you are not sure what you want, give Jimmy a call and let him walk you through some options you may have not even envisioned.  Jimmy is a wealth of information when it comes to materials, design, craftsmanship, and does it all while keeping your needs and budget in mind.  I highly recommend Bobcat Custom Outdoors and look forward to

Jimmy and Bobcat Custom Outdoors exceeded our expectations.  Jimmy's communication is amazing and we couldn't be happier with the work that he did.  We have already recommended Bobcat to many of our friends and my real estate clients.

Super easy to work with, prices were competitive, and they did everything they said they were going to do exactly when they said they would do it. We added a retaining all, French drain and leveled the kids play area with some synthetic turf and it turned out perfect!

Jimmy is great to work with. He brought our vision to reality. Jimmy is very trustworthy and most importantly he stays true to his word. His work is not finished once the construction is done. He visits timely to make sure that it was done well and to our satisfaction. If you need a fence or a covered patio , Jimmy is the best.

I am pleased to share that Jimmy and his team did a great job in building our outdoor patio. The overall finish is top notch and professional. I highly recommend Bobcat custom outdoors.
Thanks for the beautiful patio Jimmy.

I highly recommend Bobcat for outdoor construction projects! When we first engaged Bobcat we knew more about what we didn't want verses what was possible with our backyard. We gave them a budget and said "build it like you would build it for yourself". The end result was SPECTACULAR! The structure exceeded our expectations. They were so easy to work with, they're craftsmanship was excellent...and they came in under budget. We now have expanded our living space and are using the space more than w
